divs: Sighting Detailswhile out fishing this ball came down and stoped above the water about 8 or 10 feet and 50 yards down stream bobed and came up in frunt of me for a couple minutes and bobed and went up stream about 50 yards stoped and after a short time bobed and went up real fast and gone. A long time later I found out that a large familly that lived down stream saw the hole thing and always wanderd who the man fishing was . of course this is a short version of the story .
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Everett
There was one other sighting in Everett on or around June 20th 1975
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: out fishing it came down stoped three times second stop in front of me therd stop then up and gone
